short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Astirna New Tab replaces the default new tab page with a beautiful and customizable new tab page focused on productivity.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
🚀 Supercharge your day! Astirna New Tab turns every new tab into a personal productivity dashboard that helps you crush tasks, manage tabs, and stay organized — all while looking stunning!

✨ No more juggling between multiple apps or tools. Whether you're a student or professional, Astirna New Tab offers a sleek home page experience with to-do lists, speed dial for your favorite links, world clocks 🌍, and custom wallpapers. Sync across all your devices for a seamless experience!

🔥 Say goodbye to clutter! Stay on top of your schedule with integrated task managers, countdowns ⏳ for those important deadlines, and tab management to save time. Plus, with built-in integrations like Microsoft To Do and Todoist, your task lists are always up-to-date. Whether you’re closing tabs or adding tasks, it's productivity at your fingertips.

Features that make Astirna the ultimate new tab extension:

📅 To-do lists: Organize your day with tasks, sync seamlessly with Microsoft To Do and Todoist.
🖱️ Speed dial: Access your favorite sites with just one click, customized to your needs.
🌍 World clocks: Track time across multiple locations, making scheduling a breeze.
⏳ Countdowns: Never miss a deadline or special event.
📁 Tab manager: Bulk save, close, or copy tabs to streamline your browsing.
🔄 Sync: Keep your tasks, shortcuts, and settings up-to-date across all your devices.
🖼️ Custom & cloud wallpapers: Personalize your new tab with stunning visuals.

💪 Ready for better browsing? Download Astirna New Tab today and transform your front page into the ultimate command center. Stay focused, get organized, and make your browsing experience work for you! 🏆
